item.title: Short Sellers Pile Into UK Bakery Chain Greggs
item.description: Short sellers are betting against Greggs Plc at levels not seen since the global financial crisis, as the UK bakery chain struggles to convince investors that opening more shops will boost lackluster

item.title: Greggs Shares Fall to Lowest Since Pandemic as Profit Declines
item.description: Greggs Plc’s shares fell to the lowest since 2020 after the UK bakery chain reported a drop in profit in the first half of the year.
